text: Karin Schubert (born 26 November 1944) is a German actress. She became a pornographic actress in the 1980s. In 1975 she appeared in the movie Black Emanuelle starring Laura Gemser. She later appeared in Emanuelle Around the World in 1977 where she played Cora Norman. In 1994, 50-year-old Schubert left pornography. That same year she tried to commit suicide by taking barbiturates with vodka, but was rescued by neighbors. Two years later, neighbors found her unresponsive in her car, having attempted suicide a second time by carbon monoxide poisoning. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * *The Sacrifice of Karin Schubert (The Grindhouse Effect) Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:Pornographic actors Category:Actors from Hamburg
title: Karin Schubert
